original: Anāgate dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā—
analyzed: anāgate dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Paccuppanne dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā—
analyzed: paccuppanne dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Ye dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ niyatā pāṭipuggalikā upādinnā, rūpaṁ, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṁ—
analyzed: ye dhammā tesam tesam sattānam ajjhattam paccattam niyatā pāṭipuggalikā upādinnā rūpa vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇa

original: Ye dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ niyatā pāṭipuggalikā upādinnā, rūpaṁ, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṁ—
analyzed: ye dhammā tesam tesam para sattānam para puggalānam ajjhattam paccattam niyatā pāṭipuggalikā upādinnā rūpa vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇa

original: Ajjhatte dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā—
analyzed: ajjhatte dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Bahiddhā dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā—
analyzed: bahiddhā dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Ajjhattabahiddhā dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā—
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddhā dhamme ārabbha ye uppajjanti citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ
katame dhammā sa nidassana sa paṭighā
ime dhammā sa nidassana sa paṭighā
katame dhammā a nidassana sa paṭighā

original: Cakkhāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ, ghānāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, saddāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ—
analyzed: cakkha āyatana sota āyatana ghāna āyatana jivhā āyatana kāya āyatana sadda āyatana gandha āyatana rasa āyatana phoṭṭhabba āyatana
ime dhammā a nidassana sa paṭighā
vedanā kkhandhaḥ saññā kkhandhaḥ saṅkhāra kkhandhaḥ viññāṇa kkhandhaḥ
yat ca rūpam a nidassanam appaṭigham dhamma āyatana pariyāpanna
